scripts.synth:dev: cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf synth --context env=dev
scripts.diff:dev: cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf diff citytaster-dev
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run validate:dev && cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf synth --context env=dev && npx cdktf deploy citytaster-dev --auto-approve
scripts.destroy:dev: cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf destroy citytaster-dev --auto-approve
scripts.synth:prod: cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf synth --context env=prod
scripts.diff:prod: cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf diff citytaster-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run validate:prod && cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf synth --context env=prod && npx cdktf deploy citytaster-prod --auto-approve
scripts.destroy:prod: cd infra/cdktf-app/my-cdktf && npx cdktf destroy citytaster-prod --auto-approve
